EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 2 - Beyond Gigabit
EmailTemplate.subject: TD-LTE: get the facts, win the business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Two radio technologies, one goal, go beyond gigabit The question is no longer TDD or FDD LTE.
Use both radio technologies together to provide super fast throughput from a single, multi-connectivity platform. Nokia AirScale Radio Access supports high-order carrier aggregation and advanced MIMO across both technologies to deliver multi-gigabit data rates. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
